Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions about our services and processes.

What are your minimum order quantities?

Our minimum order quantities vary by product and destination. Typically, we work with container loads (20-40ft) for ocean freight, but we can accommodate smaller quantities for certain products via air freight.

How do you ensure product quality?

We have strict quality control processes including pre-shipment inspections, temperature monitoring throughout the cold chain, and compliance with international food safety standards (HACCP, GlobalG.A.P., etc.).

What documentation do you provide?

We provide complete documentation including certificates of origin, phytosanitary certificates, quality certificates, and any additional documentation required by your country's import regulations.

How long does shipping typically take?

Transit times vary by origin and destination. Ocean freight typically takes 2-4 weeks, while air freight takes 2-5 days. We provide detailed transit schedules with every quote.
